body_html:
can you git clean -xfd.
and also make sure libcaffe2.so is not in your site-packages (maybe lingering from an old install)

The reason for the error is libcaffe2_gpu.so is linking to a libcaffe2.so that was compiled with gcc <= 5.1 (either came from pytorch binaries or lingering old file somewhere)
body_text:
can you git clean -xfd.
and also make sure libcaffe2.so is not in your site-packages (maybe lingering from an old install)
The reason for the error is libcaffe2_gpu.so is linking to a libcaffe2.so that was compiled with gcc <= 5.1 (either came from pytorch binaries or lingering old file somewhere)
body:
can you `git clean -xfd`.
and also make sure `libcaffe2.so` is not in your site-packages (maybe lingering from an old install)

The reason for the error is `libcaffe2_gpu.so` is linking to a `libcaffe2.so` that was compiled with gcc <= 5.1 (either came from pytorch binaries or lingering old file somewhere)
